goal: To educate SMBs on the lesser-known advantages of outsourcing that support better decision-making.
backstory: With expertise in business management, I aim to reveal the hidden benefits of outsourcing beyond cost savings.
tasks: Analyze studies related to willpower and decision-making.
Develop content outlining outsourcing benefits for SMBs.
Create a presentation on cognitive load management.
Facilitate workshops for SMB leaders on willpower management.
